commit.message:
Patch from Andrew Pinksi.

	* configure.in: Remove wrongly added definition of
	local_prefix.
	* configure: Regenerate.

From-SVN: r69261

files.patch:
@@ -1,3 +1,9 @@
+2003-07-11  Andrew Pinski  <pinskia@physics.uc.edu>
+
+	* configure.in: Remove wrongly added definition of
+	local_prefix.
+	* configure: Regenerate.
+
 2003-07-11  Dan Nicolaescu  <dann@ics.uci.edu>
 
 	* rtl.def (NOTE): Do not use padding.

@@ -2333,7 +2333,6 @@ fi
 
 
 # Build with intermodule optimisations
-local_prefix=
 # Check whether --enable-intermodule or --disable-intermodule was given.
 if test "${enable_intermodule+set}" = set; then
   enableval="$enable_intermodule"
@@ -2350,7 +2349,7 @@ fi
 # -------------------------
 
 echo $ac_n "checking whether ${MAKE-make} sets \${MAKE}""... $ac_c" 1>&6
-echo "configure:2354: checking whether ${MAKE-make} sets \${MAKE}" >&5
+echo "configure:2353: checking whether ${MAKE-make} sets \${MAKE}" >&5

 if eval "test \"`echo '$''{'ac_cv_prog_make_${ac_make}_set'+set}'`\" = set"; then
   echo $ac_n "(cached) $ac_c" 1>&6
@@ -2383,7 +2382,7 @@ do

+echo "configure:2386: checking for $ac_word" >&5

   echo $ac_n "(cached) $ac_c" 1>&6

@@ -2413,7 +2412,7 @@ test -n "$AWK" && break
 done

-echo "configure:2643: checking for modern makeinfo" >&5

-  echo "configure:2649: version of makeinfo is $ac_prog_version" >&5

   case $ac_prog_version in
     '')     gcc_cv_prog_makeinfo_modern=no;;
     4.[2-9]*)
